summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in block 1, University Heights Addition, being the alley between University Way and 15th Avenue Northeast, from East 45th Street to East 47th Street, all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 86947, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district thereof, and providing that payment for said improvement shall be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
